known_issues: App is not connecting to the backend.
"caffeine ai" element reappeared at the bottom of the UI (regression).

existing_features.title: Fix the frontend-to-backend connection so the app can successfully create a backend actor and call the backend without showing a persistent connection error.
Remove the 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution element from the bottom of the UI so it no longer appears in the app footer.
Ensure any user-facing backend connectivity error messages are in English and remain user-friendly (no raw technical stack traces shown in the UI).
